text: Ranipet District is a district in Tamil Nadu. It is an industrial hub of Greater Vellore City. It is located about 100 kilometres (62 mi) from the Chennai city center. It is a major industrial town located on NH 4 Chennai- Bangalore highway, on the northern bank of the Palar River.The estimated population is 387,000 as of 2023. Category:Districts of Tamil Nadu
title: Ranipet district
